revision.text:
{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Dome Fossil |image = [[File:Dome_Fossil.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Dome Fossil''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Dome Fossil''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil]]. ==Details== When a '''Dome Fossil''' is placed in the [[Pokémon Day Care]], it hatches into an Kabuto. ==Mine Layout== The Dome Fossil appears in the Underground as a 4x5 sized object.

[[File:DomeFossilMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !! Pokémon |- | [[File:Dome_Fossil.png|30px]] || [[File:Kabuto.png|40px]] Kabuto |} ==Acquisition== Dome Fossils can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Mt. Moon|0}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Alph|0}} {{LootItem|Twist Mountain|0}} {{LootItem|Glittering Cave|0.5}} |} |}
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] __NOTOC__
